channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: It's sexual assault awareness month and HHS just gutted its rape prevention unit
item.description: The CDC teams that supported local sexual assault prevention groups were 'wiped out' in RFK Jr.'s overhaul of the Department of Health and Human Servi...

item.title: U.S. stock markets bounce back after Trump tariffs shock -- but nerves abound
item.description: After major slides in equity trading across the world, any slight uptick in stock prices will only repair part of the destruction of trillions of doll...

item.title: Bienvenidos! Some colleges are targeting a long-neglected group: Hispanic students
item.description: Colleges are recognizing the importance of this growing pool of potential students.

item.title: Trump's election order could jeopardize 'hundreds of thousands' of future mail ballots
item.description: Eighteen states count mail-in ballots that are received after Election Day, but a new order by President Trump challenges the practice.

item.title: Trump defends new tariffs. And, Supreme Court backs Trump in deportation case

item.title: Migrants who entered U.S. via Biden-era app stripped of legal status
item.description: Migrants who came to the U.S. via a Biden-era online appointment app​​ have been told to leave "immediately," officials say.

item.title: Roof collapse at Dominican Republic nightclub kills dozens
item.description: Rescue workers are searching for survivors beneath the rubble of the nightclub in Santo Domingo.

item.title: Best loans for bad credit, plus expert advice on finding your best option
item.description: Having bad credit doesn't always mean it's impossible to get a loan. Here are some options to explore.

item.title: Swollen rivers flood towns in the US South and Midwest
For opioid victims, payouts fall short while governments reap millions
item.description: Pharmaceutical companies accused of fueling the nation's opioid crisis are paying state and local governments billions of dollars in legal settlements...

item.title: South Sudan to accept man deported from US in bid to defuse visa row
item.description: The government initially denied entry to the man, saying he was Congolese, not South Sudanese.

item.title: Kentucky watches for surging rivers to recede so widespread cleanup can begin

item.title: Albanese and Dutton face-off in first Australia election debate
item.description: Cost of living issues dominated the debate and the political rivals were asked about Trump's tariffs.

item.title: Global executions at highest level since 2015, report says
item.description: But Amnesty International also says only 15 countries carried out the death penalty, the lowest on record

item.title: Fifty hippos killed by anthrax in DR Congo
item.description: Efforts are now under way to recover the animals and bury them to prevent further spread.

item.title: Stocks rebound on hopes Trump will negotiate tariff deals
item.description: The stock market is rebounding Tuesday after a three-day sell-off sparked by President Trump's tariffs.

item.title: Colleges around the US say some international students’ visas are being revoked
